abstract: From Bits: Guessing what type of company — or for that matter, how many companies — Cisco Systems will purchase has turned into a favorite pastime of local gossips, especially given its $30 billion in cash.
snippet: From Bits: Guessing what type of company — or for that matter, how many companies — Cisco Systems will purchase has turned into a favorite pastime of local gossips, especially given its $30 billion in cash.

headline.main: Fresh Targets Added to ‘The Wheel of Cisco’
